::Hot Rod::

Unitrons lasers destroy the land just behind Hot Rod. He finaly comes
apon the other Maximals, and transformes to bot mode. As do
Cleder,Rixer,Forrior,Blyer and Firearm. They all fire two shots each at
Unitron.
